meanings: [명사] sympathy (for), pity (for), compassion (for), [동사] sympathize (with), pity, have[feel] sympathy (for), take[have] pity (on)
(한복 깃에 덧대는 칼라) dongjeong, thin white cloth-covered paper collar for Korean traditional clothes
